description.value:
Requirements You have a bonded partner.

Since becoming bonded with your partner, you've learned a lot about them, and you're beginning to pick up their habits, interests, and knowledge. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.Adopted Ancestry], but you must select the ancestry of your bonded partner. You also gain one 1st-level ancestry feat from the ancestry you chose for Adopted Ancestry.

Special You must have a permanent partner bond to select this feat, meaning you can't be a mercurial dragonkin.
